siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
blogPost.body: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
blogPost.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu
blogPost.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 很多应用都包含了系统的 "共享 "菜单，但默认的共享服务通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服务，比如复制、打开在、另存为和保存到下载。
很多應用都包含了系統的 "共享 "菜單，但默認的共享服務通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服務，比如複製、打開在、另存爲和保存到下載。

previous.excerpt: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.
previous.title: Paraglide - Create automated AI workflows in minutes.

localize.description: Paraglide是第一个机器学习API，让你可以在几分钟内创建、定制和协作自动化AI工作流程。修改你想要的东西，让我们来处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内创建自动化的AI工作流程。

localize.description: Paraglide是第一個機器學習API，讓你可以在幾分鐘內創建、定製和協作自動化AI工作流程。修改你想要的東西，讓我們來處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內創建自動化的AI工作流程。

next.excerpt: All in one influencer search, management and campaign tracking software from Buzzbomb. This is this our first functionality launch and we'll be adding Social Scheduling, Social Monitoring and Competitor Tracking in the coming months.
next.title: Influencers by Buzzbomb - Find, manage and track influencers.

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影响者搜索、管理和活动跟踪软件。这是我们首次推出的功能，我们将在未来几个月内增加社交日程安排、社交监控和竞争对手跟踪功能。
localize.tagline: 寻找、管理和跟踪影响者。

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影響者搜索、管理和活動跟蹤軟件。這是我們首次推出的功能，我們將在未來幾個月內增加社交日程安排、社交監控和競爭對手跟蹤功能。
localize.tagline: 尋找、管理和跟蹤影響者。
